title: success4all
author: success4all
content: LeoFinance adoption campaignLeoFinance is a layer2 DAPP on Hive Blockchainhttps://leofinance.io/The LeoFinance adoption campaign is run on the Zealy platform.From 01 May to 10 June, you will be completing quests listed in Zealy and collecting bounty points. The winners will get the following cash prices:1st place: 5k Liquid Leo2nd place: 2.5k Liquid Leo3rd place: 1.5k Liquid Leo4th & 5th place: 500 Liquid Leoand6th place: 25k Leo Power delegation7th place: 20k Leo Power delegation8th-10th place: 10k Leo Power delegation11th-15th place: 5k Leo Power delegationin addition, if you complete individual packs of quests successfully, you will be able to win:Limited edition  NFTsVarying amounts of Leo Power delegations for varying durationsRaffle tickets for HiveFest ticket giveaway later this year.All these wins come after the campaign is over, but, you want instant gratification and win a bounty - right away, right after you joined the campaign - as soon as you have completed your first Zealy quest that will earn you lifelong passive income?We are taking part in the campaign as "Tamil Charity Coin" Community in the Hive blockchain.You can claim the Tamil Charity Coin instant bounty by joining and representing our community. Follow these 3 steps to claim it:1. Join the Zealy Campaign through our link:https://zealy.io/c/leofinance-4960/invite/mNz7i4QLuVZcADyc9R99aand complete your very first quest. (You must complete at least one quest to claim your Tamil Charity Coin instant bounty)if you have already joined the campaign that is OK. You can skip this step.2. Join the "Tamil Charity Coin" Community in the Hive blockchain:https://peakd.com/c/hive-129653/createdif you are already a member of the "Tamil Charity Coin" Community, you can skip this step.3. Come back to LeoFinance and make a post in the threads with this text ("The Threads" is LeoFinance's Twitter alternative)"I'm on Threads for the Adoption Campaign that started on April 30, and I represent the "Tamil Charity Coin Community" @tamilcharitycoin"To claim your Tamil Charity Coin instant bounty come back here and reply to this post with:Your LeoFinance/Hive Username:and stating that you have completed your first Zealy quest.
